# Employment data

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Ship time series data on formal employment in Mexico. The data is from the Mexican Social Security Institute (IMSS) and is available from January 1997 to `r last_available |> format("%B %Y")`. The data is available at a monthly frequency and is not seasonally adjusted.
